solution_line_template: Last week, she used {this_week_fuel} gallons * {percent_less} = <<{this_week_fuel}*{percent_less}={fuel_less}>>{fuel_less} gallons less fuel than she used this week.
This means that she used {this_week_fuel} gallons 3 {fuel_less} gallons = <<{this_week_fuel}-{fuel_less}={last_week_fuel}>>{last_week_fuel} gallons of fuel last week.
In total, Mary used {this_week_fuel} gallons + {last_week_fuel} gallons = <<{this_week_fuel}+{last_week_fuel}={total_fuel}>>{total_fuel} gallons of fuel.
